content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I successfully used the "write_to_file" command to write "This is the text to write to the file." to the file at "/path/to/file". I executed the "execute_shell" command to run a Python script and received a "Hello, World!" output. I used the "google" command to search for the best places to visit in Europe and received a list of URLs. I attempted to use the "get_hyperlinks" command, but it failed due to too much output. I used the "get_text_summary" command to get an overview of Python programming language from Wikipedia. I attempted to use the "list_files" command on a non-existent directory and received an error. I then successfully used the "write_to_file" command to write "This is the new text to write to the file." to the file at "/path/to/file", followed by using the "append_to_file" command to append " This is the text to append to the file." to the same file. Lastly, I attempted to use the "replace_in_file" command, but it failed to find the specified text.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "replace_in_file", "args": {"filename": "/path/to/file", "old_text": "old text", "new_text": "new text", "occurrence_index": 0}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command replace_in_file returned: No matches found for old text in /path/to/file', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "ls -l /path/to/directory"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb\'\'\nSTDERR:\nb"ls: cannot access \'/path/to/directory\': No such file or directory\\n"', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "list_files", "args": {"directory": "/path/to/directory"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command read_file returned: This is the text to write to the file.This is the text to append to the file.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "write_to_file", "args": {"filename": "/path/to/file", "text": "This is the new text to write to the file."}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command write_to_file returned: File written to successfully.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "append_to_file", "args": {"filename": "/path/to/file", "text": " This is the text to append to the file."}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command append_to_file returned: Text appended successfully.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "replace_in_file", "args": {"filename": "/path/to/file", "old_text": "This is the text to write to the file.", "new_text": "This is the new text to replace the old text with.", "occurrence_index": 0}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command replace_in_file returned: No matches found for This is the text to write to the file. in /path/to/file', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "ls -l /path/to/directory"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb\'\'\nSTDERR:\nb"ls: cannot access \'/path/to/directory\': No such file or directory\\n"', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "list_files", "args": {"directory": "/path/to/directory"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command read_file returned: This is the new text to write to the file. This is the text to append to the file.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "write_to_file", "args": {"filename": "/path/to/file", "text": "This is the text to write to the file."}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command write_to_file returned: File written to successfully.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "append_to_file", "args": {"filename": "/path/to/file", "text": " This is the text to append to the file."}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command append_to_file returned: Text appended successfully.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "replace_in_file", "args": {"filename": "/path/to/file", "old_text": "This is the text to write to the file.", "new_text": "This is the new text to replace the old text with.", "occurrence_index": 0}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command replace_in_file returned: File /path/to/file updated successfully.', type='action_result')]
"""
